description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry & Choc Chip Pancake Scones recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Raspberry & Choc Chip Pancake Scones Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup cooking chocolate chip dark bits

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Empty dry pancake mix into a large bowl. Add cream and use clean hands to form a dough. Add chocolate chips and raspberries and combine, taking care not to overwork the mixture.
Roll mixture into six balls and sit closely together on prepared tray. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve warm with jam and cream.
